short_summary: Acquisition of bakery products in Quebec as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement 
### E6MON-23PQBO - Request for Standing Offer: Bakery Products 

### Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services issued a request for standing offer for the acquisition of bakery products located in Quebec.

### Background
The Government of Canada has invited bidders to submit their proposals for the provision of bakery products. 

### Tender Information
#### Title
E6MON-23PQBO - SCM Request Standing Offer for Bakery products 

#### Reference Number
WS3887518377

#### Solicitation Number
WS3887518377

#### Tender Opening Date
November 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM ET

#### Expected Contract Start Date
None

#### Expected Contract End Date
March 31, 2024

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open bidding

#### Selection Criteria
The lowest price

#### Notice Type
Request for Standing Offer

#### Regions of Opportunity
Quebec (except the National Capital Region)

### Contact Information
#### Name
Selina Ly (SPAC/PSPC) (she/her)

#### Email
[selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Website
[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16641730?extsite=MTY2NDE3MzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16641730?extsite=MTY2NDE3MzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Notice URL
[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16641730?extsite=MTY2NDE3MzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16641730?extsite=MTY2NDE3MzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Trade Agreements
The Government of Canada has applied the following trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Peru Free Trade
